name: Candles & Shadows
description:
Candles & Shadows is a short game submitted for the Newbies Winter Special jam (https://itch.io/jam/newbies-winter).

---

Santa needs your help! Evil elves are trying to disrupt Christmas and are patrolling the house to catch you. Place all 4 gifts under every Christmas tree. Remember to stick to the shadows and avoid any lights.

Controls:

  • Use arrows or WSAD to move
  • You can place gifts with SPACE
